title: Corel Goodies Pack
description:
............................Flux976 - Corel Goodies Pack...........................




Corel programs included in iso file:


 - Designer Technical Suite 12

 - Graphics Suite X4 14 Full

 - Painter X + Keygen

 - Stand alone x4 Keygen - just an extra

 - Learning Painter X w/ Jeremy Sutton - Video tutorials





_________________________________________________________________________






Installation


To unpack the contents of the .iso file either mount the drive with emulation software such as daemon tools or burn to a dvd and install from dvd.

Corel Designer requires use of some other programs to install and or unpackage it. Isobuster, magiciso and daemon tools are the ones I use for most torrents. I believe all you need is isobuster to unpack and install designer. Using isobuster or program like it. Open the .cue file, find the installer, once located install. Once prompted for the serial/key choose trail. After the install open any program, choose evaulation, close the program. Next, find the crack folder. Then, drag and drop, or copy and paste the PSIkey.dll into the directory C:\\\\Program Files\\\\Corel\\\\Corel DESIGNER Technical Suite 12\\\\Programs and ok the overwrite of original file. Enjoy! 

All of the remaining Corel programs have the install directions in a readme.txt file within their folders. 




Enjoy and Seed!
